_a-0000e98b-cfe0-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord

_a-0000eea8-05c2-8000-9db5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SMS_AI_SearchHistory_SetMetaData

000aeeab-af46-8000-29e9-7f0000014e7a.name: CMGT_SMS_AI_WriteSearchHistory

_a-0000eea8-05c2-8000-9db5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_SMS_AI_QR_GetSearchHistory
_a-0000eea8-05c2-8000-9db5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!CMGT_SMS_AI_SearchHistory,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  filters: {
    ri!additionalFilters,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_SMS_AI_SearchHistory.searchId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!searchId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_SMS_AI_SearchHistory.createdBy,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!createdBy
    )
  },
  logicalExpressions: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  fields: { ri!fields },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: ri!sort
)
